page.title: 16Heritage Farm
page.content: Heritage Farm is being set up just next door to our school at Clough Head. The Colne Valley Heritage Farm is to provide opportunities for all members of the community - young and old volunteers, and unemployed, to work together and to pass on the old crafts and skills to the next generation. It is hoped to raise enough money to buy or rent enough land to put up suitable buildings to house an ever growing collection of exhibits. We have been to the farm to see Ben the horse being shod by the blacksmith. We also saw the two drover's caravans and the three calves that are still very small.
